current.name: Current Mayor

tourism.title: üèñ Tourism Potential
tourism.description: Zemmouri boasts stunning beaches, green landscapes, and a calm Mediterranean climate. Its coastline attracts tourists for relaxation, fishing, and cultural festivals every summer.

agriculture.description: Thanks to fertile lands and access to the sea, agriculture and fishing are the pillars of Zemmouri‚Äôs economy. Olive oil, citrus fruits, and seafood are among the top products.
